action.action-desc: Mr. Lamborn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for veterans’ mortgage life insurance to include members of the Armed Forces receiving specially adapted housing assistance from the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Expansion of eligibility for veterans’ mortgage life insurance to include members of the Armed Forces receiving specially adapted housing assistance from the Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 2106 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (f), by inserting , members of the Armed Forces, after veterans; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking veteran’s indebtedness and inserting indebtedness of the veteran or member of the Armed Forces; and
in paragraph (2), by striking veteran’s ownership and inserting ownership of the veteran or member of the Armed Forces.
